name: Undying Torch
description:
# Description

🔥 Undying torch 🔥 is a game where you, a chicken whose three eggs were stolen, must carry a torch to retrieve them. Watch out, as your torch only lasts for 10 seconds before going out.

[This is a remake of an old jam submission](https://ciber-turtle.itch.io/carry-the-fire).

## Help, if you need it

If you get stuck you can pause with escape and choose one of the two cheats.
